name: reminders-backend
description: Node, Express & Postgres backend for reminders

scripts.backupdb: rm -f links_dump.sql && pg_dump -f links_dump.sql --table public.links reminders
scripts.restoredb: psql -c "DROP TABLE links" reminders && psql -d reminders -f links_dump.sql
scripts.restoreproddb: echo DROP TABLE "public"."links" | yarn dbprodconnect && cat links_dump.sql | yarn dbprodconnect
scripts.backupproddb: rm -f links_dump.sql && rm -rf latest.dump && heroku pg:backups:capture && heroku pg:backups:download && pg_restore latest.dump -f links_dump.sql
